resources.string: The world\'s **fastest** messaging app.\nIt is **free** and **secure**.
**Telegram** delivers messages faster than\nany other application.
**Telegram** is free forever. No ads.\nNo subscription fees.
**Telegram** keeps your messages safe\nfrom hacker attacks.
**Telegram** has no limits on\nthe size of your media and chats.
**Telegram** lets you access your messages\nfrom multiple devices.
Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.
This account is already logged in from this app.
Contacts from this device will be added to this account.
Contacts from this device will not be added to this account.
Contacts from this device will be added to your account.
Turn on to continuously sync contacts from this device with your account.
Contacts from this device were added to your account.
Weâ€™ve sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone **%1$s**.
We\'ve sent the code to the **Telegram** app on your other device.
We\'re calling your phone **%1$s**.\n\nDon\'t accept the call, Telegram will process everything automatically.
Calling your phone **%1$s** to dictate the code.
Send the code as an SMS

Somebody with access to **%1$s** has requested to delete your Telegram account and reset your 2-Step Verification password.\n\nIf this wasn\'t you, please enter the code we\'ve just sent you via SMS. You can also cancel this by *changing your phone number*.
Since the account **%1$s** is active and protected by a password, we will delete it in 1 week for security purposes.\n\nYou can cancel this process at any time.
You\'ll be able to reset your account in:
Your recent attempts to reset this account have been cancelled by its active user. Please try again in 7 days.
The deletion process was cancelled for your account %1$s. You may close this window now.
Your login code is **%1$s**. Enter it in the Telegram app where you are trying to log in.\n\nDo not give this code to anyone.
Enter your name and add a profile picture.
